modName: Dragonborn Cuirass -Dawnguard light armor to heavy- STANDALONE
summary: I made Dawnguard light armor heavy, because I love that one much and I need more protection for my one-handed character in legendary diffuculty. It\'s standalone and craftable, so you can still have the light one.
descriptionHtml:
I made Dawnguard light armor heavy, because I love that one much and I need more protection for my one-handed character in legendary diffuculty. It\'s standalone and craftable, so you can still have the light one.It\'s not include gloves and boots, because cuirass has enough armor rate.
You can look at the images for armor\'s stats.
author: yusuf1604
